creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly purchased by the Center with a gift of funds from David Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description: twelve large panels come together to form mountain village landscape with lush trees, water, and clouds, and mountain slopes
markings: marks: number of panel written in pencil top edge LC of canvasses; panel 12, LRC, square intaglio and oval dragon relief seals; label with title and panel number top edge center of canvasses
title: Hekiba Village
